name: Spencer Tracy Movies Quiz | Spencer Tracy | 10 Questions

questions.text: In 'Bad Day at Black Rock', the leader of the evil force in town is played by whom?
questions.explanation:
Robert Ryan.

	Ryan is the leader. Marvin and Borgnine are his thugs. Brennan is the doctor.With Dean Jagger, too. Fine movie.

questions.text: In 'Inherit the Wind', the role of the newspaperman (based on the H.L. Mencken figure) is played by this actor.
questions.explanation:
Gene Kelly.

	Kelly is the reporter. York plays the teacher (Scopes) and Akins is a minister. Fredric March is the lawyer who opposes Tracy. Another good movie.

questions.text: In 'Judgment at Nuremberg', one of the key defendants is played by this actor.
questions.explanation:
Burt Lancaster.

	Lancaster is the judge who is on trial. Widmark and Schell are prosecutor and defense attorney, respectively. Clift is a witness.

Priest.

	Clark Gable played the gambler and saloon owner. Tracy (and Gable) were oil men in 'Boom Town'.

questions.text: In 'Boom Town', Tracy and Gable were rivals for this actress.
questions.explanation:
Claudette Colbert.

	Francis was in 'Black Rock'. Dietrich was in 'Nuremberg'. Macdonald was in 'San Francisco'.

questions.text: Who co-starred with Tracy in 'The Mountain'?
questions.explanation:
Robert Wagner.

	Ericson was in 'Black Rock'. Poitier was in 'Guess Who's Coming To Dinner?'. Morgan was the judge in 'Inherit the Wind'.

questions.text: Tracy starred in 'The Old Man and the Sea'. Who wrote the novel upon which the movie was based?
Which movie did NOT have Katharine Hepburn as a co-star?
questions.correct: It's A Mad Mad Mad Mad World
questions.explanation:
It's A Mad Mad Mad Mad World.

	Everyone else was in the movie - large cast of name stars.

questions.text: Mickey Rooney co-starred with Tracy in which movie?
questions.explanation:
Boys Town.

	Tracy played Father Flanagan to a young Rooney.

Guess Who's Coming to Dinner.

	With Hepburn and Poitier.
